group_1.textLeft: So you two rushed over when you sensed a@Witch's presence.

group_1.textRight: Yup. I met up with Homura on my way@here.
I didn't think you'd be fighting by yourself,@Madoka...

group_1.textLeft: You really saved me. Kamihama Witches@are strong.
(But the three of us were able to beat@her... It will be okay.)
A Witch from Kamihama, huh... I figured @that must've been one.

group_1.textRight: Yes... I think it was one of the same ones@we saw in Kamihama.
Maybe one of its Familiars turned into a@Witch.

group_1.textLeft: If that's the case, then...
We need to figure out why a Kamihama Witch@was in Mitakihara.
Yeah.
I was thinking... I want to go to Kamihama@tomorrow.
There's a lot I'd like to find out.
I want to learn about the Wings of the@Magius, and how to not become a Witch.
Plus, there's Mami...
I don't think we'll figure out what's going @on with her unless we go to Kamihama.
Homura, Sayaka... Will you please go with@me?

group_1.textRight: Why are you even asking? Of course we'll go@with you!

group_1.textLeft: Sayaka...

group_1.textRight: I was just thinking that I wanted to go to@Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: Homura...

group_1.textRight: Unlike Mitakihara, we aren't at risk of@becoming Witches there...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... But we can't be sure Doppels are@safe either...
Let's go to Kamihama tomorrow to look into@that, too!
Sayaka? What's wrong?
I'm fine, I'm fine! It's nothing, really!
So anyway, should we meet up at the station@tomorrow?
Y-yeah.

group_1.textRight: Awesome! I'll see you both tomorrow! Don't be@late, got it?
